question: BepiColombo, which was in news recently, is a spacecraft launched to explore which planet/ celestial body?
explanation:
BepiColombo is a joint mission of the European Space Agency (ESA) and the Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA), which aims to explore Mercury.
Recently, the spacecraft has crossed Venus for the first time and captured an image of Venus from a distance of 17,000 kilometres. The spacecraft was launched in 2018 to undergo a seven-year trip to Mercury.
